strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Ideal Bounding Rect Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved idealBoundingRect returns the ideal size for the current text inside the edit element. This property's value is affected by other properties such as multiline and wordwrap.
strings.INTRO: The edit control has a cool property called idealBoundingRect. Type some text into one of the edit boxes. Then click the Resize button below it.
